products.name: Basic Protection
products.descr: Liability coverage including bodily injury and property damage

products.name: Extended Protection
products.descr: All the protection of the Basic plus uninsured and underinsured motorist coverage

products.name: Pro Protection
products.descr: All the benefits of Extended Protection plus comprehensive coverage including theft or vandalism

products.name: Silver Package
products.descr: Pro plus premium collision coverage including extended repair or replacement of the car

products.name: Gold Package
products.descr: Silver plus medical payments coverage including costs of hospital visits surgery and more

products.name: Platinum Package
products.descr: Gold plus personal injury protection including other expenses like childcare or lost income
